short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Identify which npm libraries are used on any website you visit.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Bundle Scanner allows you to get a list of open source Javascript libraries are used on the website you're currently visiting

The extension analyzes every Javascript file from the website you're currently vising, searching through the files for code that matches any of the 101,962 releases it has indexed from 35,003 of the most popular npm libraries on the web.

The results are not 100% accurate. In benchmark tests, approximately 15% of libraries that are actually inside the bundle are not identified, and around 5% of libraries identified are false positives.
